Synopsis: Creates a new user message for a chat request.
Description: The New-ChatRequestUserMessage function creates a new user message for a chat request. It takes a user request as input and returns a hashtable containing the role and content of the message.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
$userRequest = "Hello, I need assistance with my account."
New-ChatRequestUserMessage -userRequest $userRequest
# Returns:
# @{
#     'role'    = 'user'
#     'content' = 'Hello, I need assistance with my account.'
# }
